name: CKRecordZone
desc: A database partition that contains related records.

items.name: init(zoneName: String)
items.desc: Creates a record zone object with the specified zone name.

items.name: init(zoneID: CKRecordZone.ID)
items.desc: Creates a record zone object with the specified zone ID.

items.name: class CKRecordZone.ID
items.desc: An object that uniquely identifies a record zone in a database.

items.name: var zoneID: CKRecordZone.ID
items.desc: The unique ID of the zone.

items.name: var capabilities: CKRecordZone.Capabilities
items.desc: The capabilities that the zone supports.

items.name: struct CKRecordZone.Capabilities
items.desc: The capabilities that a record zone supports.

items.name: var share: CKRecord.Reference?
items.desc: A reference to the record zoneâ€™s share record.
